name: Mysterious Blocks (itch)
description:
Mysterious Blocks is an addictive puzzle game in which you will find many interesting and difficult levels.

You have to go from start to finish, solving puzzles of a mysterious stranger. Where this will lead you, no one knows. It is up to you to decide whether you will be able to go this way.

Features of the game:

- Many levels

- Convenient management

- Physics
